Title: She Spat At Me
Plot: Patty tries to find out what Gregory knows about the case. Arthur Frobisher tries a new strategy to save his family and his money. David and Ellen have strains on their relationship as Lila tries to reenter David's life.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Zachary Booth, Joanne Lamstein, Sarita Choudhury, Jennifer Missoni, Michael Pemberton, Madison Arnold, Elliot Korte, Josh Pais, Peter McRobbie
